item.title: Installing Kanboard on macOS
item.description: Kanban is a lean method for project management that has been popular in software development and knowledge work. Recently, after reading a bunch of blog articles and technical booklets, I came up with an idea to use the Kanban method to manage my scientific projects. After all, speaking of the production of knowledge work, scientific research is analogous to manufacturing. I came across a powerful open source Kanban software â€” Kanboard.
